 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רָז‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Dan.2.18|Dan 2:18]]</sup> ==secret== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Persian loan-word; = Pahlavi <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***r¹z***</u></abbr>, New Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***r¹z***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Andr|Andr]]<sup>M 83</sup> \*); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ר‎</span> [[Dan.4.6|Dan 4:6]], emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רָזָא‎</span> [[Dan.2.18|Dan 2:18]]; [[Dan.2.19|Dan 2:19]]; [[Dan.2.27|Dan 2:27]]; [[Dan.2.30|Dan 2:30]]; [[Dan.2.47|Dan 2:47]] plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רָזִין‎</span> v[[Dan.2.28|Dan 2:28]] v[[Dan.2.47|Dan 2:47]], emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רָזַיָּא‎</span> v[[Dan.2.29|Dan 2:29]].
